data.prayer: Father, encourage the 36,315 believers in Thiruvananthapuram to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Thiruvananthapuram words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary: On average, 6 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Arandan people might believe through him.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Thiruvananthapuram do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India has a population of 3,301,400.

We estimate Thiruvananthapuram has 36,315 people who might know Jesus, 40,057 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,225,028 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
